item.title: Hello Kitty 所有者的股票周转率超过丰田汽车
item.description: Hello Kitty的所有者三丽鸥公司（Sanrio Co.）上个月的股票成交额超过了日本最大的公司丰田汽车公司（Toyota Motor Corp.【原文：Hello Kitty owner Sanrio Co. surpassed Japan’s biggest company Toyota Motor Corp. in stock turnover last month on the firm’s inclusion to the MSCI index and its perceived resilience to tariff risks.】

item.title: 印度央行立场转为中性 印度债券抹去涨幅
item.description: 印度央行意外地将政策立场转为中性，甚至将基准利率下调了半个百分点，超出预期，印度债券抹去了涨幅。【原文：Indian bonds erased gains after the central bank unexpectedly changed its policy stance to neutral even as it reduced the benchmark rate by a bigger-than-expected half a percentage point.】

item.title: 印度央行意外降息 50 个基点刺激经济增长
item.description: 随着贸易不确定性给经济增长前景蒙上阴影，以及通胀消退，印度央行出人意料地大幅降息以提振经济。【原文：India’s central bank surprised with a bigger-than-expected interest rate cut to boost the economy, as trade uncertainties cloud growth prospects and inflation subsides.】

item.title: 美国财政部呼吁日本央行加息以纠正日元疲软态势
item.description: 美国财政部呼吁日本央行提高利率以加强日元汇率，在其半年度货币报告中对东京的政策建议比以往更加深入。【原文：The US Treasury called on the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates to strengthen the yen, stepping much deeper into policy recommendations for Tokyo than before in its semiannual currency report.】

item.title: 特朗普斥资 120 亿美元消灭旅游业
item.description:
总统第二任期已满四个月，他的政策正在颠覆全球旅游业。【原文：

Four months into the president’s second term, his policies are upending tourism worldwide.

】

item.title: 斯塔默对股市的冷漠不利于经济增长
item.description:
对于伦敦的上市地位来说，这又是糟糕的一周。那么，政府近期的政策将重点放在私人市场投资上未免太可惜了。【原文：

It’s been another bad week for London’s status as a listing venue. A shame, then, that recent government policy has focused on private markets investing.

】

item.title: 烧树发电不可持续
item.description:
只有当英国政府能够制定出更好的愿景并付诸实施时，继续支持 Drax 集团才有意义。【原文：

Continued support for Drax Group will only make sense if the UK government can detail a better vision — and execute it. 

】

item.title: 波兰货币政策委员会主席科特奇称对进一步宽松政策持谨慎态度
item.description: 波兰央行行长路德维克-科特奇（Ludwik Kotecki）表示，由于政治局势日益不稳定以及对预算臃肿的担忧，波兰决策者对进一步降息越来越谨慎。【原文：Polish policymakers are turning increasingly cautious toward further interest-rate cuts due to growing political instability and concern over a bloated budget, central banker Ludwik Kotecki said.】

item.title: 葡萄牙考虑提高黄金签证计划的吸引力
item.description: 在西班牙因担心黄金签证对房地产市场的影响而取消黄金签证不到两个月后，葡萄牙正在考虑是否要为其黄金签证计划增添甜头，并使针对外籍人士的特殊税制更具吸引力。【原文：Less than two months after Spain scrapped its golden visa due to concerns about its effect on the housing market, Portugal is considering whether to sweeten its golden visa program and make a special tax regime for expatriates even more attractive.】

item.title: 欧洲防务股狂潮的赢家，从化学品到护目镜制造商
item.description: 今年，欧洲最大的国防类股票大涨，吸引了一些显而易见的赢家，导致投资者深入挖掘其他可能受益于数十亿军事预算转移的股票。【原文：This year’s surge in Europe’s biggest defense stocks has elicited some obvious winners, leading investors to dig deeper beneath the surface for other names that might stand to benefit from the billions being diverted toward military budgets.】

item.title: H&M 亿万富翁悄然将零售商推向私有化
item.description: Hennes & Mauritz AB 是一家快速时尚零售商，自 1974 年以来一直在瑞典证券市场上市，目前正稳步向私有化回归。【原文：Hennes & Mauritz AB, the fast-fashion retailer that’s been listed on the Swedish stock market since 1974, is steadily moving back toward private ownership.】

item.title: 据说 Stonepeak 正在就 21 亿美元收购银盛一事进行独家谈判
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Stonepeak Partners 正在就收购 Yinson Holdings Bhd 进行独家谈判，该公司的估值可能高达 90 亿林吉特（约合 21 亿美元），这可能是马来西亚今年最大的交易之一。【原文：Stonepeak Partners is in exclusive talks for a buyout of Yinson Holdings Bhd. that may value the firm at as much as 9 billion ringgit ($2.1 billion), according to people with knowledge of the matter, in what could be one of the biggest deals in Malaysia this year.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利开设 xAI 图书馆，马斯克成了特朗普的靶子
item.description: 即使在埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）与唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统公开闹翻之前，摩根士丹利为这位科技大亨的公司出售债务也一直是件棘手的事。但 xAI 公司本应与众不同。【原文：Even before Elon Musk and President Donald Trump’s public falling out, selling debt for the tech mogul’s companies has always been tricky for Morgan Stanley. But xAI Corp. was supposed to be different.】

item.title: 分析师看涨，Swiggy 股票将迎来 2025 年最好的一周
item.description: Swiggy Ltd.将创下今年以来的最大单周涨幅，这主要是受到印度公司主要食品外卖业务前景向好以及遏制快速商业亏损举措的提振。【原文：Swiggy Ltd. is headed for its biggest weekly gain of the year, buoyed by a brighter outlook for the Indian company’s main food delivery business and moves to curb quick commerce losses.】

item.title: 日本与美国就汽车和稀土问题展开关税谈判
item.description: 日本和美国已经开始了最新一轮的贸易谈判，媒体报道称东京代表团正试图通过承诺在美国生产更多汽车和加强稀土合作来赢得关税缓和。【原文：Japan and the US have begun the latest round of trade negotiations, with media reports suggesting Tokyo’s delegation is trying to win a reprieve from the tariffs by pledging to make more cars in the US and enhancing cooperation on rare earths.】

item.title: 经济学家因关税问题下调新加坡 GDP 和 CPI 增长预测
item.description: 由于全球贸易战的不确定性使狮城容易受到风险的影响，经济学家下调了新加坡国内生产总值和消费价格的增长预测。【原文：Economists have cut growth forecasts for Singapore’s gross domestic product and consumer prices as uncertainties of the global trade war leave the Lion City vulnerable to risks.】

item.title: 通胀缓解，俄罗斯即将迎来 2022 年以来的首次降息
item.description: 俄罗斯央行即将迎来三年来的首次降息，因为通胀的缓解为在高借贷成本重压下挣扎的经济打开了一扇解脱之门。【原文：Russia’s central bank is on the cusp of the first interest-rate cut in three years, as easing inflation opens the door to relief for an economy struggling under the weight of high borrowing costs.】

item.title: 中国人民银行通过月中意外披露注入三个月现金
item.description: 中国央行周五向市场新增了1万亿元人民币（1390亿美元）的三个月期资金，此前，中国央行在月中意外披露了这一操作，目的可能是避免出现季节性现金紧缩。【原文：China’s central bank added 1 trillion yuan ($139 billion) of three-month funds into markets on Friday, following a surprise mid-month disclosure for the operation likely aimed at preempting a seasonal cash crunch.】

item.title: 降息在即，印度债券涨势或将加深
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 韩国将在货币清单之后继续与美国讨论外汇问题
item.description: 在美国财政部将亚洲盟友列入观察名单并呼吁遏制货币干预之后，韩国将继续与美国讨论其外汇政策，以促进相互理解。【原文：South Korea will continue to discuss its foreign exchange policy with the US to promote mutual understanding, after the Treasury kept the Asian ally on its watchlist and called for curbing currency intervention.】

item.title: 印尼财富基金考虑在 70 亿美元的 Grab-GoTo 交易中发挥作用
item.description: 印尼主权财富基金 Danantara 正在考虑在 Grab 控股有限公司计划斥资 70 亿美元收购 GoTo 集团的交易中扮演一个角色，从而有可能让印尼政府在亚洲互联网巨头中分一杯羹。【原文：Indonesia’s sovereign wealth fund Danantara is considering a role in Grab Holdings Ltd.’s planned $7 billion acquisition of GoTo Group, potentially allowing the country’s government to own a slice of an Asian internet powerhouse.】

item.title: 日本最快将于七月调整债券销售的压力增大
item.description: 市场预期日本政府可能最快在下个月调整债务发行，增加短期证券的销售，减少长期证券的发行。【原文：Expectations in the market are intensifying that the Japanese government may adjust debt issuance as soon as next month by increasing sales of shorter maturity securities and trimming offerings of longer-dated ones.】

item.title: 黄金的廉价贵金属同行飙升至多年高点
item.description: 白银维持在 13 年高位附近，受到技术突破的支撑，铂金也升至 2022 年以来的最高水平，这表明投资者对工业部门使用的贵金属的胃口越来越大。【原文：Silver held near a 13-year high, supported by a technical breakout that also drove platinum to the highest level since 2022, signaling growing investor appetite for precious metals used by the industrial sector.】

item.title: Omada Health 首次公开募股融资 1.5 亿美元，定价在区间中间
item.description: Omada Health Inc. 的首次公开募股募集到了 1.5 亿美元，这家数字医疗保健公司的股票价格处于市场定价范围的中间位置。【原文：Omada Health Inc.’s initial public offering raised $150 million, with shares of the digital health-care company pricing in the middle of the marketed range.】

item.title: 比亚迪降价失误引发 200 亿美元股价暴跌
item.description: 比亚迪（BYD Co., Ltd.）发起的新一轮电动汽车价格战在短短两周内已使其市值缩水 200 亿美元，人们对这家中国顶级汽车制造商的战略持怀疑态度，使其大幅反弹的势头有所减弱。【原文：A renewed EV price war launched by BYD Co. has shaved $20 billion off its market value in just two weeks, as skepticism over the top Chinese automaker’s strategy takes some steam out of its big rally.】

item.title: 债券交易员期待美国就业报告释放美联储加息路径信号
item.description: 债券交易员将仔细研究 5 月份的就业报告，寻找劳动力市场疲软的迹象，以判断美联储降息的时机。【原文：Bond traders will dissect the May jobs report for any signs of a softening labor market as they gauge the timing of Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts.】

item.title: 关税战扰乱商业，日本五月初出口下降
item.description: 由于特朗普政府的全面关税继续扰乱贸易，日本的出口在 5 月份的前 20 天出现下降。【原文：Japan’s exports fell in the first 20 days of May as the Trump administration’s sweeping tariffs continued to disrupt trade.】

item.title: 日本家庭支出下降，经济萎缩雪上加霜
item.description: 在美国关税措施全面启动之前，日本经济就已开始萎缩，4 月份日本家庭支出出人意料地下降，原因是通胀高企阻碍了可自由支配的支出，这对政策制定者来说是一个令人担忧的迹象。【原文：Japan’s household spending unexpectedly declined in April as elevated inflation deterred discretionary spending, in a worrisome sign for policymakers after the economy began contracting even before US tariff measures fully kicked in.】

item.title: 极端天气考验着印度的基础设施建设事业
item.description: 印度今年的季风是 2009 年以来最早的一次，破坏了全国各地新建的公共基础设施，给印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪推动世界第五大经济体基础设施升级带来了压力。【原文：Indian monsoons this year — the earliest onset since 2009 — damaged new public infrastructure across the country, putting pressure on Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s push for an infrastructure upgrade in the world’s fifth-largest economy.】

item.title: 特朗普与习近平通话释放贸易紧张局势缓和信号后，石油保持涨势
item.description: 由于有迹象表明中美贸易紧张局势有所缓解，石油价格在周四上涨后持稳。【原文：Oil was steady after advancing Thursday on signs of easing trade tensions between the US and China.】
